thread.title: BRIEF-Primero Announces Shareholders Vote In Favour Of Transaction With First Majestic

title: BRIEF-Primero Announces Shareholders Vote In Favour Of Transaction With First Majestic

organizations.name: first majestic reuters staff first majestic silver corp

text: March 13, 2018 / 5:12 PM / in 12 minutes BRIEF-Primero Announces Shareholders Vote In Favour Of Transaction With First Majestic Reuters Staff First Majestic Silver Corp: * PRIMERO ANNOUNCES SHAREHOLDERS VOTE IN FAVOUR OF TRANSACTION WITH FIRST MAJESTIC * PRIMERO MINING CORP - COMPANY WILL NOW SEEK A FINAL ORDER FROM SUPREME COURT OF BRITISH COLUMBIA TO APPROVE THE TRANSACTION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
